sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../component-styles/contactForm.css'; function ContactForm() { const [formState, setFormState] = useState({}); const changeHandler = (event) => { setFormState({ ...formState, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); } const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const config = { Username: 'palash.deshmukh02@gmail.com', Password: '0B03BAF851426BD498FE75F37DAB504C842F', Host: 'smtp.elasticemail.com', Port: 2525, To: 'palash.deshmukh02@gmail.com', From: formState.email, Subject: `${formState.fname} viewed your portfolio`, Body: `${formState.fname} connected to you over email`, }; } return ( <>

Get in Touch with Me


Let's Begin the Conversation. Share a bit about yourself, and we'll reach out to you as soon as possible.

) } export default ContactForm;
